statements: SELECT * FROM EmergencyResponseTeam;
SELECT team_name, location FROM EmergencyResponseTeam WHERE id = 1;
SELECT contact_number FROM EmergencyResponseTeam WHERE team_name = 'Medical Team';
SELECT * FROM EmergencyResponseTeam WHERE location = 'Hospital';
SELECT id, team_name, location, contact_number FROM EmergencyResponseTeam ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmergencyResponseTeam WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT team_name, location FROM EmergencyResponseTeam ORDER BY team_name ASC
SELECT * FROM EmergencyResponseTeam WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT team_name, location, contact_number FROM EmergencyResponseTeam WHERE team_name LIKE '%Response%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS team_count FROM EmergencyResponseTeam WHERE location = 'California'
SELECT * FROM nuclear_incidents;
SELECT incident_description, incident_location FROM nuclear_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Leak';
SELECT * FROM nuclear_incidents WHERE radiation_level > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM evacuation_guidelines WHERE evacuation_zone = 1;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type FROM nuclear_incidents ORDER BY incident_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_incidents WHERE radiation_level > 3.0 ORDER BY incident_location DESC
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, radiation_level FROM nuclear_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Leak'
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM nuclear_incidents WHERE incident_location LIKE '%Japan%'
SELECT * FROM evacuation_guidelines JOIN nuclear_incidents ON evacuation_guidelines.incident_id = nuclear_incidents.incident_id WHERE evacuation_zone = 1
SELECT * FROM nuclear_incidents WHERE radiation_level > 5.0 ORDER BY incident_type ASC
SELECT * FROM NuclearIncidents;
SELECT incident_name, incident_date, radiation_level FROM NuclearIncidents WHERE radiation_level > 0.05;
SELECT * FROM RadiationLevels WHERE sensor_location = 'Reactor 1';
SELECT incident_name, location, radiation_level FROM NuclearIncidents ORDER BY radiation_level DESC;
SELECT evacuation_order, safety_instructions FROM EvacuationGuidelines WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM NuclearIncidents;
SELECT incident_name, incident_date, location FROM NuclearIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RadiationLevels WHERE radiation_reading > 2.0;
SELECT incident_name, location FROM NuclearIncidents WHERE location = 'Tokyo';
SELECT incident_name, radiation_level FROM NuclearIncidents JOIN RadiationLevels ON id = measurement_id WHERE measurement_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY radiation_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Nuclear_Incidents;
SELECT incident_date, location FROM Nuclear_Incidents WHERE incident_id = 3;
SELECT description FROM Nuclear_Incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Radiation_Levels WHERE location = 'Tokyo' AND value > 3.0;
SELECT team_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM Emergency_Response_Teams;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM Nuclear_Incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, description FROM Nuclear_Incidents WHERE location LIKE '%Japan%';
SELECT team_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM Emergency_Response_Teams ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Radiation_Levels WHERE value > 0.5 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT location, instructions FROM Evacuation_Guidelines WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT * FROM Nuclear_Incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_location FROM Nuclear_Incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT evacuation_location, evacuation_route FROM Evacuation_Guidelines WHERE evacuation_id = 3;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, team_phone_number FROM Emergency_Teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, accessed_table, access_timestamp FROM Access_Logs ORDER BY access_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Nuclear_Incidents;
SELECT incident_location, radiation_level FROM Nuclear_Incidents WHERE radiation_level > 5.0;
SELECT incident_id, incident_location, incident_date FROM Nuclear_Incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Radiation_Levels ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT evacuation_location, evacuation_route FROM Evacuation_Guidelines WHERE evacuation_id % 2 = 0;
